doc.title: American Prison: The Forgotten Jews
doc.plot: "AMERICAN PRISON: THE FORGOTTEN JEWS" is a journey into the hearts, minds and souls of the most hated, hidden and isolated segment of our nation's Jews. Shunned and ostracized by their own people on the outside, and a minority on the inside, these murderers, rapists and thieves have connected with their Jewish faith inside the grim environment of our nation's prisons.
